information: GKR Hydro GmbH develops, produces and markets Hydro Profi Line® greening systems for sustainable and functional greening on all sealed surfaces, surfaces without soil and buildings. The Hydro Profi Line® plant systems offer the following advantages: • Sustainable reduction in water consumption for greening by up to 80%.• Unique root vegetation space with air and water for perfect root ventilation.• No root compaction or decay in the floor area as there is no filling material around the pot.• Large water reservoir as there is no displacement by plant substrates.• Unique Quick Change System to quickly change plants without difficulty.• Suitable for all plants in soil and hydroponics.• Suitable for any location in rooms and open spaces.• For correct watering at any time as it is virtually impossible to pour over the pots
